entity_types.name: Researcher
entity_types.description: Individuals who conduct research, often at RAND, possessing various methodological expertise.
common_contexts: Director Methods Center for Causal Inference

entity_types.name: Research Method
entity_types.description: Systematic approaches or techniques used to conduct studies, gather data, and analyze information.
common_contexts: methodological areas that you're operating at
what methods are you applying at Rand

entity_types.name: AI Tool/Application
entity_types.description: Software or platforms that leverage artificial intelligence to assist with various research tasks.
common_contexts: early adopter of a lot of these tools
AI tools to help with my code

entity_types.name: Research Data
entity_types.description: Raw or processed information collected, analyzed, or used as input in research studies.
common_contexts: content of a lot of different posts

entity_types.name: Research Output
entity_types.description: Deliverables, findings, or products resulting from research activities.

entity_types.name: Research Challenge
entity_types.description: Difficulties, obstacles, or limitations encountered during the research process.

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: Institutions or entities involved in or affected by research, including research organizations, sponsors, and competitors.
common_contexts: implementing AI very much in Arroyo

relationship_types.name: USES
relationship_types.description: Describes the application or utilization of a research method or AI tool by researchers or organizations in their work.

example_relationships.context: For me it's a lot of interviews
I have used AI tools to help with my code.
RAND maintained for the army called JICM

relationship_types.name: PERCEIVES
relationship_types.description: Captures a researcher's subjective view, feeling, or assessment of a research-related element.

example_relationships.context: Finding the right people and recruiting them.
Coding Is very annoying.
it was difficult for me to like a just inherently trust what it was spitting out

relationship_types.name: IMPACTS
relationship_types.description: Describes how one element causes a change or consequence in another, particularly concerning AI's influence on research.

example_relationships.context: the role that AI plays in implementation science
I worry about career development and skillset development among the younger folks.
I have stories of my own spectacular recruitment failures

relationship_types.name: PRODUCES
relationship_types.description: Denotes the creation of tangible or intangible results from research activities or AI processing.

example_relationships.context: producing some kind of statistical quantified output
generate text for me
take the whole proposal and say write an executive summary

relationship_types.name: REQUIRES
relationship_types.description: Indicates a dependency where a method or process needs certain elements to function or be completed.

example_relationships.context: focus groups, you kind of gotta have...a sample already to pick from.
rely on spreadsheets to draft your literature reviews
need to really see good evidence that i can trust it before using for lit reviews

relationship_types.name: SUPPORTS
relationship_types.description: Describes how an AI tool or other resource facilitates or aids in the execution of research tasks.

example_relationships.context: RAND has a product to help on the coding side. Right muse.
finding people maybe supporting scheduling like that kind of thing feels like like AI could nail that out of the park.
AI tools to check the code, annotate the code

relationship_types.name: COMPARES
relationship_types.description: Describes the act of assessing similarities and differences between various research elements, often for evaluation.

example_relationships.target: LLM for theme coding to supervised machine learning to humans
example_relationships.context: comparing Directly, like the LLM for this kind of theme coding to supervise machine learning to humans.
see like whether it was As accurate as our Ra's.
